pageTitle: Comet Car Rental South Africa - Car Hire At Its Best
textBeforeTable: National DAILY Car Rental Rates Effective 1 January 2014 Price Table In addition you can `insure your excess` for a nominal extra fee in which case there is no excess payable in any event.  Specifically excluded from the above cover are tyres,hubcaps,windscreeens and undercarriage damage but you may choose to add a minimal extra charge per day and then be completely covered ! (R20 per day Group A,B,C,Z or R50 per day Group D,G,X,Y) Additional drivers can be listed for a nominal R200 per driver per rental. Our delivery and collection charges are very reasonable considering the price of petrol - we charge R200 for each delivery or collection. Baby seats and booster seats for older children can be supplied for R300 per rental. GPS is available on request for an additional R75 per day - please confirm availability at time of reservation. There is an additional one off charge of R60 for contract fee and the only other extra is the cost of re-fuelling the vehicle if it is not returned full. Please see the insurance and rules pages for further details.
